description.en: Through the Vivid platform, we aim to consolidate every and all aspects of cryptocurrency discussions into one single application that's freely accessible on the go as well as at home. Our key features are the adding of a range of technical analysis tools to portfolios, as well as viewing these in real time, in 3D space through augmented reality. By being able to view your TA at every angle, we expect our user base to be able to learn about TAs more intricately. Adding community contributions in the forms of TAs and articles to the mix, truly allows for users to tap into the collective knowledge of crypto enthusiasts and professionals around the world.

ico_data.short_desc: Vivid is disrupting the way people interact with cryptocurrencies and the communities around them.
